### Convert IP addresses list to CIDR list

Example:
```
104.21.32.39
104.21.50.150
104.244.42.212
104.244.42.3
142.251.1.102
142.251.1.139
142.251.1.198
151.101.244.158
172.217.132.106
173.194.73.113
173.194.73.139
199.232.40.159
209.85.226.10
209.85.226.38
209.85.226.8
209.85.233.119
64.233.161.100
64.233.165.91
64.233.165.93
74.125.100.105
74.125.8.70
87.245.216.145
87.245.216.173
87.245.222.141
```

Output:
```
64.233.160.0/21
74.125.0.0/17
87.245.216.0/21
104.21.32.0/19
104.244.42.0/24
142.251.1.0/24
151.101.244.158/32
172.217.132.106/32
173.194.73.0/24
199.232.40.159/32
209.85.224.0/20
```

Output (-m):
```
64.233.160.0 255.255.248.0
74.125.0.0 255.255.128.0
87.245.216.0 255.255.248.0
104.21.32.0 255.255.224.0
104.244.42.0 255.255.255.0
142.251.1.0 255.255.255.0
151.101.244.158 255.255.255.255
172.217.132.106 255.255.255.255
173.194.73.0 255.255.255.0
199.232.40.159 255.255.255.255
209.85.224.0 255.255.240.0
```
